title: Name this font please
content:
Need this font to edit a customer’s image. Please ID.  
’What The Font’ isn’t helping.

 [‹ (x) Lippincott/Integrine/Millennium Promise - Locator Display, Gotham {Michael A, Jan E}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202193552/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36835 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) "Cottages" serif face w/ beaks - Warnock {Nick Cooke, Angel} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202193552/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36805 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Production Three

I think that’s Bob Medium Oblique

Jason C

... with a drop shadow, faux-small-caps, and dumb quotes.

- Lex

Naah, it’s not Medium, it’s Bob Pro Semibold Oblique _Subhead_.  
Easy to confuse.
With the nickname, which is insanely common, “Bob der Baumeister”.
